attributes.action: Give Petula Clark a long overdue Damehood
attributes.additional_details: I present  nostalgia programmes on an award winning wireless station (Angel Radio) and have often mentioned this lack of a Damehood for Petula Clark. Every such comment has resulted in  numerous e.mails, letters and phone calls in agreement. People have said it could be because she lives abroad - this is nonsense as many other recipients do not reside in the UK
attributes.background: Petula Clark has  been in show business  as a child and singing star since 1942,and a European star since 1957 and International star since Downtown topped the American charts in 1965.,not to mention her charity work for UNICEF,AIDS,and other charities .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
